Process of removing sulfur from fluids in the [[hydrotreater|Hydrotreater]] . [[Sour gas|Sour Gas]] is created as a byproduct of all hydrotreating recipes. [[Crude oil|Crude Oil]] and [[cracked oil|Cracked Oil]] are hydrotreated into [[desulfurized crude oil|Desulfurized Crude Oil]] and [[desulfurized cracked oil|Desulfurized Cracked Oil]]. [[Natural gas|Natural Gas]] can be hydrotreated into [[petroleum gas|Petroleum Gas]].

It also allows some fuels to be converted into higher-energy fuels, such as coal gasoline.
